name: plugin-marketplace-monorepo
description: Plugin Marketplace - Monorepo with 3 separate Vercel projects

scripts.setup: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../publisher && npm install
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:publisher"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:publisher
scripts.install:projects: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../publisher && npm install
scripts.db:reset:all: npm run db:reset:backend && npm run db:reset:publisher
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:publisher
